content: अमल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Free from dirt or impurities, pure, undefiled, stainless, spotless; <ls>Ku. 7. 32</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 7.">33</ls>; अमलाः सुहृदः <ls>Pt. 2. 171</ls> pure, sincere. {@--2@} White, bright, shining; कर्णावसक्तामलदंतपत्रं <ls>Ku. 7. 23</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 80.</ls> --ला {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the goddess Lakṣmī. {@--2@} The navel cord. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (<ab>Mar.</ab> आंवळा) Emblica Officinalis Gærtn; also of a plant (सातलावृक्ष) also {%<ab>n.</ab>%} in this sense. --लं {@--1@} Purity. {@--2@} Talc. {@--3@} The Supreme Spirit.
